top.subtitle: I’m an Software Developer with experience in creating products for web. I have developed an IloT platforms and a process control systems, and have improved user interfaces and user experience using technologies like Angular, Angular Material, and Material Design 3.

about.title: About Me.
about.main-text: I'm a **Software Developer** with a passion for creating robust and **user-friendly** software solutions. My journey in development has equipped me with skills in a variety of **modern** technologies.
about.text: My objective is to build **efficient and elegant** applications with a focus on clean code architecture and exceptional user experience.

showcases.title: Showcases
showcases.recent-apps-description: Here are some of the recent applications I've worked on, showcasing my skills in app development and design.

### Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV:

---

### Disclaimer

**Liability for content**  
The contents of this website were created with the greatest care. However, no guarantee is given for the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the content.  

**Liability for links**  
This website may contain links to external third-party websites, on whose content no influence can be exerted. No guarantee is assumed for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for their content.  

---

### Copyright

The content and works created on this website are subject to German copyright law. Reproduction, processing, distribution, or any kind of use beyond the limits of copyright law requires the prior written consent of the respective author or creator.  

---

## Privacy Policy

**Data protection**  
The protection of your personal data is important to me. The use of this website is generally possible without providing personal data.  

---

### 1. Controller

Rostyslav Tulika  
Hessenstraße 45  
36358 Herbstein  
E-Mail: [rostik.tulika@gmail.com](mailto:rostik.tulika@gmail.com)  

---

### 2. Collection and storage of personal data

* When visiting this website, information is automatically collected by the hosting provider (so-called server log files). This includes:  

* IP address  
* Date and time of the request  
* Accessed page/file  
* Browser type & version  
* Operating system  
* Referrer URL  

These data cannot be assigned to specific persons. A combination of this data with other data sources will not be carried out.  

---

### 3. Google Fonts

This website uses Google Fonts, a service provided by Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland.  
When visiting a page, your browser loads the required fonts directly from Google servers in order to correctly display texts and fonts. In doing so, your IP address is transmitted to Google.  

More information can be found in Google’s privacy policy:  
https://policies.google.com/privacy  

The use of Google Fonts takes place in the interest of a uniform and appealing presentation of this website.  

---

### 4. Cookies & Analytics

This website uses **no cookies and no tracking** (e.g. Google Analytics), unless you add it later.  

---

### 5. Contact

If you contact me by e-mail, your data will be stored only for processing your request and will not be passed on without your consent.  

---

### 6. Your rights

You have the right at any time to:  

* Obtain information about your stored data  
* Rectification, deletion, or restriction of processing  
* Object to processing  
* Data portability  

---

### 7. Hosting

The website is hosted by an external service provider. This provider is contractually obligated to comply with the GDPR.  

---

### 8. Changes to this privacy policy

I reserve the right to update this privacy policy if changes to the website or legal requirements make it necessary.
